short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically pushes your coding challenge solutions to GitHub upon successful submission

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
INTERACTIVE GRAPHS:
As solutions are uploaded to GitHub, Coding Challenge Companion automatically generates interactive graphs to summarize your progress.

GITHUB INTEGRATION:
With the intuitive user interface, authenticating with GitHub and setting up your coding challenge repository is quick and easy.
